node.title: How To Make a Short Film - a step-by-step filmmaking course
node.headline: Enjoy a hilarious short comedy "Dinner Date" and learn how it was made. Develop your skills and make your own short film

node.title: Film School On Demand - How to Make & Sell your First Movie
node.headline: If you've wondered how to make a movie and dreaming of making your own one, then this is the course for you!
